item.title: String Performance: The Fastest Way to Get a Stringâ€™s Length
item.description: Retrieving the character count of a string in .NET has various methods: using Span with Length, Length, or Enumerable.Count(). This article will prove which is the fastest method. Link to article: https://dotnettips.wordpress.com/2026/01/25/string-performance-the-fastest-way-to-get-a-strings-length/
